#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++;
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /*
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
    shared_ptr<RaftServer>rf  = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
  uint64_t *index_p,*term_p;
  uint64_t index=0,term=0;
  index_p = &index;
  term_p = &term;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable>cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);


  auto e = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  //e->Set(1);
   pair<string,shared_ptr<IntEvent>>new_request(to_string(oid),e);
   req_map.insert(new_request);


  if(rf){
    bool startOk = rf->Start(cmd,index_p,term_p);
    if (startOk && !rf->IsDisconnected()){
      Log_info("PUT CALLED at server %d",rf->site_id_);
      //cout<<"Thread ID while calling start entry "<<this_thread::get_id();
      //usleep(300000);
      req_map[to_string(oid)]->Wait(20*1000*1000);
      if(req_map[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE){
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }else{
          //cout<<"returning timeout hereP"<<endl;
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }else{
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
  }
    //cout<<"returning timeout hereP 2"<<endl;
  return KV_TIMEOUT;

  /* your code here */

}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid,
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
    shared_ptr<RaftServer>rf  = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
    uint64_t *index_p,*term_p;
    uint64_t index=0,term=0;
    index_p = &index;
    term_p = &term;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("app");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
   auto e = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();

  shared_ptr<Marshallable>cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
   pair<string,shared_ptr<IntEvent>>new_request(to_string(oid),e);
   req_map.insert(new_request);


  if(rf){
    bool startOk = rf->Start(cmd,index_p,term_p);
    if (startOk && !rf->IsDisconnected()){
      Log_info("APPEND CALLED at server %d",rf->site_id_);
      req_map[to_string(oid)]->Wait(20*1000*1000);
      if(req_map[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE){
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }else{
        //cout<<"Returning TIMEOUT hereA"<<endl;
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }else{
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
  }
    //cout<<"returning timeout hereA 2"<<endl;
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  shared_ptr<RaftServer>rf  = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
  uint64_t *index_p,*term_p;
   uint64_t index=0,term=0;
  index_p = &index;
  term_p = &term;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back("GET_VAL_OP");
    auto e = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();

   shared_ptr<Marshallable>cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
   pair<string,shared_ptr<IntEvent>>new_request(to_string(oid),e);
   req_map.insert(new_request);

  if(rf){
    bool startOk = rf->Start(cmd,index_p,term_p);
    if (startOk && !rf->IsDisconnected()){
      Log_info("GET CALLED at server %d",rf->site_id_);
      req_map[to_string(oid)]->Wait(20*1000*1000);
      if(req_map[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE){
        *v = val_map[k];
        // cout<<val_map[k] == NULL;
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }else{
          //cout<<"returning timeout hereG"<<endl;
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }else{
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
  }
    //cout<<"returning timeout hereG 2"<<endl;


  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
    shared_ptr<RaftServer>rf  = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
    string operation = v->data_[1];
    string k  = v->data_[2];
    string val = v->data_[3];
    string oid = v->data_[0];
    if(operation == "put"){
      val_map[k]=val;
    }else if(operation == "app"){
      if( val_map.find(k) != val_map.end()){
        val_map[k]+=val;
      }else{
        val_map[k]=val;
      }
    }else{
       val_map.find(k);
    //   cout<<"Value at Key "<< k<< " is "<< val_map[k] <<endl;
    }
    if(rf->my_state == Leader){
      //cout<<"Thread ID while applying  entry "<<this_thread::get_id()<<endl<<endl;

        if(req_map.find(oid) != req_map.end()){
          //Log_info(" operation %s, k %s,v %s",operation,k,val);


          req_map[oid]->Set(1);
          Log_info("Leader %d applied a command",rf->site_id_);
          // cout<<"---------------------------------"<<endl;
          // cout<<k<<" "<<val<<" "<<operation<<endl;
          // cout<<"---------------------------------"<<endl;
        }
    }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++;
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
